titles.title: Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2019
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2019
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2019
To amend the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 to reauthorize the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network.
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.
Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 116-276.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 221.

action.text: Mr. Neguse moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2427.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act of 2019
This bill reauthorizes for FY2020-FY2025 the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network and the Chesapeake Bay Gateways Grants Assistance Program.
